title: Thirsty season
creator_credit: Jan Sharp, Richard Davis, Laughing Kookaburra Productions and Traffic Accident Research Unit
brief_description: Deals with the making of a beer commercial. Raises issues about the influence of the mass media on community attitudes, and the way in which this beer advertisement is structured to create preferences for a particular brand.
